title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: All Garden of Whimsy Star Path Duties and Rewards
description: The Wonderland and Disney Fairies themed Garden of Whimsy Star Path in Disney Dreamlight Valley offers tons of colorful rewards.
author: Samantha Puc
excerpt: The Wonderland and Disney Fairies themed Garden of Whimsy Star Path in Disney Dreamlight Valley offers tons of colorful rewards.
text: Disney Dreamlight Valley introduces long-awaited characters from Disney’s 1951 animated adaptation of Lewis Carroll’s Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland, including the Cheshire Cat and Alice herself, in its free Wonderland Whimsy update. The update also launches the Garden of Whimsy Star Path, with items inspired by Alice in Wonderland and Disney Fairies.Here are all of the Garden of Whimsy Star Path duties and rewards in Disney Dreamlight Valley.Disney Dreamlight Valley players can access the Garden of Whimsy Star Path upon launching the free Wonderland Whimsy update. A certain number of duties and rewards will be accessible immediately, and players can choose to spend Moonstones to unlock all duties and rewards, including the Ultimate Star Path.Moonstones can be acquired through blue chests found randomly throughout the Valley, participation in the weekly DreamSnap photo contest, or through purchase in the Premium Shop. html:
Disney Dreamlight Valley introduces long-awaited characters from Disney’s 1951 animated adaptation of Lewis Carroll’s Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland, including the Cheshire Cat and Alice herself, in its free Wonderland Whimsy update. The update also launches the Garden of Whimsy Star Path, with items inspired by Alice in Wonderland and Disney Fairies.

Here are all of the Garden of Whimsy Star Path duties and rewards in Disney Dreamlight Valley.

Disney Dreamlight Valley players can access the Garden of Whimsy Star Path upon launching the free Wonderland Whimsy update. A certain number of duties and rewards will be accessible immediately, and players can choose to spend Moonstones to unlock all duties and rewards, including the Ultimate Star Path.

Moonstones can be acquired through blue chests found randomly throughout the Valley, participation in the weekly DreamSnap photo contest, or through purchase in the Premium Shop. Here are all of the duties from the Garden of Whimsy Star path and how to complete them.

RiddleTask TypeTargetRequirementsToken Reward
Uproot Night Thorns.Remove Night Thorns (Dreamlight Valley), Splinters of Fate (Eternity Isle), and/or Inkies (Storybook Vale)Any1010

Tackle Royal Tasks.Complete Royal DutiesAny510

Related: Disney Dreamlight Valley Teases a Long-Awaited Character in a Big Way

Garden of Whimsy Star Path Rewards & Token Costs in Disney Dreamlight Valley

Disney Dreamlight Valley players who complete Garden of Whimsy Star Path duties can use their earned tokens to redeem Alice in Wonderland and Disney Fairies-inspired rewards. These include new critter companions, furniture, Touch of Magic motifs, clothing, and even a new Dream Style for their in-game house.

These are the Garden of Whimsy Star Path rewards and token costs.

Players who claim all of the above Garden of Whimsy Star Path rewards will unlock nine Ultimate Star Path rewards, listed below.

Those are all of the Garden of Whimsy Star Path duties and rewards introduced in the Disney Dreamlight Valley Wonderland Whimsy free update.
